units.title: Aggregate formation with ROCK inhibitor
units.text: 2 × 105 cells per mL on 6-well low-attachment plate 50 μM Y27632
units.rationale: Establishes uniform hPSC aggregates while preventing dissociation-induced cell death.

units.title: Mesoderm induction
units.text: Start mesoderm differentiation induction 12 μM CHIR99021, 30 ng/mL BMP-4
units.rationale: Activates WNT signaling and BMP pathway to drive hPSCs toward mesodermal fate.

units.title: Vascular lineage induction
units.text: Start vascular differentiation induction 100 ng/mL VEGF-A, 2 μM forskolin
units.rationale: Promotes specification of mesodermal progenitors into endothelial and pericyte lineages.

units.title: Embedding for vessel sprouting
units.text: Vessel sprouting d5 into collagen I–Matrigel matrix (12-well plate) 100 ng/mL VEGF-A, 100 ng/mL FGF-2, 15% FBS
units.rationale: Provides a 3D matrix and growth factors that support angiogenic sprouting.

units.title: Extraction of vascular networks
units.text: Extract blood vessel networks for blood vessel organoid self-assembly (12-well plate) ~20 min for 1 well (~50–60 organoids)
units.rationale: Isolates individual networks that will self‑assemble into organoids.

units.title: Transplantation into mice
units.rationale: Allows in vivo maturation and integration of human vessels with mouse circulation.

units.title: EDTA wash of hPSCs
units.text: Wash hPSCs with 0.5 mM EDTA by removing E8 medium and replacing it with 0.6 mL of 0.5 mM EDTA per well of a 6-well plate.
units.rationale: Gentle dissociation prepares cells for enzymatic detachment while preserving viability.

units.title: Accutase digestion
units.text: Aspirate the EDTA solution, add 0.6 mL of Accutase per well and incubate for 3–5 min at 37 °C.
units.rationale: Enzymatically detaches cells to generate a single‑cell suspension for aggregation.

units.title: Aggregate incubation
units.text: Place 3 mL of cell suspension per well into a 6-well low-attachment plate and incubate for 1 d until cell aggregates with smooth borders (>50- to 100-µm diameter) have been formed (Fig. 2b).
units.rationale: Forms uniformly sized aggregates that are essential for reproducible differentiation.

units.title: Induction of vascular differentiation in gel
units.text: Add prewarmed (37 °C) StemPro-34 SFM complete medium including 15% FBS, 100 ng/mL VEGF-A and 100 ng/mL FGF-2 to induce blood vessel differentiation. Sprouting vessels should appear after 1–3 d after embedding.
units.rationale: Supplies necessary nutrients and growth factors to drive sprouting of endothelial networks within the matrix.
